data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 22658, Version Hash: 3030f47c839a11c3ff30a9197db5b7d4d3af7afc
data.actual_result: The grey background and the area where elements can be moved to only cover part of the screen.
data.expected_result: The overlay-area should stretch the whole display.
data.short_description: Overlay does not cover whole display with custom windows text-scaling
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Windows Display Settings (right click on desktop, Display Settings) - Select anything different then 100% at the drop-down for "size of text..." - click on "sign off to apply" - sign in to your windows account again, start Discord, start a game - open the overlay
